description: A comprehensive maturity model for securing Human-Assisted Intelligence (HAI) systems across six critical domains: Software, Infrastructure, Endpoints, Data, Processes, and Vendors. Adapted from OWASP SAMM to address the unique security challenges of AI-augmented systems.
